record.field:
Dear ${(object.order_document.partner_id.name)},

Your payment for Order Reference: ${(object.order_document.name)} has been successful.

Please find a copy of your receipt attached to this email.

If you have any further enquiries don't hesitate to contact us.

Regards,

${(object.realex_settings.sender_account.name)}
Realex Project Manager Notification e-mail template

Customer ${(object.order_document.partner_id.name)} has paid for Project ${(object.order_document.name)}.

The realex transaction has order id: ${(object.order_id)}.

In Odoo the sale order has been confirmed, an invoice generated and the amount paid registered against the invoice.

The next step is to assign translators to the tasks that have been created in Odoo automatically.

You can follow this link ${(object.project_link)} to log into Odoo and manage the project.
Realex Account De-activated Notification e-mail template
Our Realex Account has been de-activated

An attempted Credit Card payment in Odoo received the response that our Realex Account has been suspended

Please contact Realex Payments to resolve this issue. No Credit Card payments will be successfully processed until this issue is resolved
Send Quote with full payment realex link

Hello ${object.partner_id.name},

Here is your ${object.state in ('draft', 'sent') and 'quotation' or 'order confirmation'} from ${object.company_id.name}:

  REFERENCES
  Order number: ${object.name}
  Order total: ${object.amount_total} ${object.pricelist_id.currency_id.name}
  Amount Due: ${object.x_amount_due} ${object.pricelist_id.currency_id.name}
  Order date: ${format_tz(object.date_order, tz=user.tz, context={'lang':object.partner_id.lang})}
% if object.origin:   Order reference: ${object.origin}
% endif % if object.client_order_ref:   Your reference: ${object.client_order_ref}
% endif % if object.user_id:   Your contact: ${object.user_id.name} % endif

% if object.state not in ('done', 'cancel'):

It is possible to pay directly with credit card:

Pay here % endif

If you have any question, do not hesitate to contact us.

Thank you for choosing ${object.company_id.name or 'us'}!



${object.company_id.name}

${object.company_id.partner_id.sudo().with_context(show_address=True, html_format=True).name_get()[0][1] | safe} % if object.company_id.phone:
Phone:  ${object.company_id.phone}
% endif % if object.company_id.website:
Web : ${object.company_id.website}
%endif
